segments.text: How long do you plan on staying ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't know ! Can I park my car now ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We are open from nine to nine . So be sure to be back by then .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Fine ! I'll be back by nine then . Don't worry .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Alright . There's a spot open at the far end of the lot . Here's your parking stub .
segments.speaker: S1
